name: humizen Magna PLUS
description: Humizen Magna Plus is a revolutionary humic-fulvic product, delivering the unique properties of humalite in a durable, fertilizer-compatible granule, partially solubilized for rapid release and availability in any soil type. Contains 50% humic acid and 3% fulvic acids (HPTA method). The extraction method used to produce Magna Plus isolates the fulvic acids and most bioactive humic acids contained within this unique source material. The result is a potent liquid humate that will give your crop the boost it needs. Compatible with a wide range of dry fertilizers and multiple packaging and application options, HumiZen Magna Plus is designed for convenience and efficiency in any farm operation.
